## OtherPersonFactory.create() method

Create [OtherPerson](./verse-core.otherperson.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
create(
    sessionIdStr: string,
    avatar: Uint8Array,
    position_x: number,
    position_y: number,
    position_z: number,
    angle: number
  ): OtherPerson;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  sessionIdStr | string | Uniquely identifying ID. The same user will have a different ID each time they connect. |
|  avatar | Uint8Array | Avatar data passed by [Player.getAvatar()](./verse-core.player.getavatar.md)<!-- -->. |
|  position\_x | number | Position passed by [Player.getPosition()](./verse-core.player.getposition.md)<!-- -->. |
|  position\_y | number | Position passed by [Player.getPosition()](./verse-core.player.getposition.md)<!-- -->. |
|  position\_z | number | Position passed by [Player.getPosition()](./verse-core.player.getposition.md)<!-- -->. |
|  angle | number | Frontal orientation passed in [Player.getAngle()](./verse-core.player.getangle.md)<!-- -->. |

**Returns:**

[OtherPerson](./verse-core.otherperson.md)
